props.name: modelValue
props.description: True if the checkbox is checked, false otherwise (or the value of the `trueValue` or `falseValue` props if they have been set). In most cases you should use `v-model` instead of setting this prop directly.

props.name: trueValue
props.description: The value to set the `v-model` to if the checkbox is checked.

props.name: falseValue
props.description: The value to set the `v-model` to if the checkbox is not checked.

props.name: id
props.description:
The ID for this checkbox.

If you don't provide an ID, one will be generated automatically.

props.name: name
props.description:
The value of the `name` attribute for this checkbox.

If you don't provide a name, one will be generated automatically.

props.name: value
props.description: If the parent checkbox group has a `v-model` array, this value will be added to the array if the checkbox is checked.

props.name: divider
props.description: The divider text to show above the checkbox if this checkbox is exclusive. This should usually be 'or'.

props.name: exclusive
props.description: Whether checking this checkbox should deselect all other checkboxes in this group.

props.name: label
props.description: Text to use within the label. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: labelClass
props.description: Classes to add to the label tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: hint
props.description: Text to use within the hint. If content is provided in the `hint` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: hintClass
props.description: Classes to add to the hint span tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the label. If content is provided in this slot, the `label` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: hint
slots.description: The content of the hint. If content is provided in this slot, the `hint` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: conditional
slots.description: Content to show if the checkbox is checked.
